io.sphere.sdk.meta

Class DocumentationGuidelines

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sphere.sdk.models.Base
      • io.sphere.sdk.meta.DocumentationGuidelines

  • public final class DocumentationGuidelines
extends Base
    This page describes the steps to follow for developers when documenting the API.
    • Do not use code comments for explaining the code; code should be self-explaining. But it can be necessary to explain the rationale for the solutions.
    • Models should link to their commands and builders.
    • Every h3 tag should have an id to be referenced and in the toc.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class io.sphere.sdk.models.Base

        equals, hashCode, toString

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, finalize, getClass, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
